title: Sibling Advicery: Brooms Wars/Sexting
description:
On this week's Sibling Advicery, Bob and Monet give advice on accepting that you're not the hookup type, to come out or to not come out to your homophobic family, and what to do when you've talked a big game over sext, but can't deliver IRL. Bob and Monet also give advice on dealing with messy roommates, losing your threesome virginity, and so much more!
Go to PrettyLitter.com and use code RIVALRY to save 20% on your first order.
Visit Audible.com/rivalry or text rivalry to 500-500.
Put science to work and unlock your best hair with Living Proof! Go to LivingProof.com/SIBLING and use code SIBLING to get 10% off your first purchase.
Don’t fall for subscription scams. Start cancelling today at Trubill.com/RIVALRY
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
